title: This Akali shroud has no counter?!
body: What is this crap?  She gets her 2 autos with bonuses then shrouds for the passive reset. Then 2 autos and i'm down to 30% hp. Only turrets can see akali now. As rush would say "no counterplay". Riot this is the stupidest change ever.

replies.body: Who the hell loses to this new Akali? She's objectively the worst champion in the game right now.

There are a handful of champions with true sight that can see her. OFC akali mains think its ridiculous that a champion is allowed a hard counter.
She is actually pretty weak ATM but yes, her shroud has no in game counterplay.
What is dodging a spell like a competent human being?

"There is no counterplay"
"Except for this counter play right here"
"B-but it doesn't count because you were a competent human being and dodged it"

Yeah ok buddy.
Seems like Akali will forever be brainless and disgusting.
